clause_text: Claims for pre-existing medical conditions are excluded from coverage unless specifically declared and accepted by the insurer.
The policy has a 30-day waiting period for all claims except emergency treatments.
Coverage includes hospitalization expenses up to the sum insured amount.
Maternity benefits are covered after 36 months of continuous policy tenure.
Claims arising from self-inflicted injuries or suicide attempts are not covered.
Dental treatment is covered up to Rs. 50,000 per policy year after 6 months waiting period.
Alternative medicine treatments including Ayurveda, Homeopathy are covered up to Rs. 25,000.
Claims for treatment outside India require prior approval from the insurance company.
Cosmetic or plastic surgery is excluded unless medically necessary due to accident or illness.
Mental health treatments are covered up to Rs. 1,00,000 per policy year.
